resources.string: This is a study to test the efficiency and effectiveness of voice navigation with or without a wake call\n Instructions are to click on the tasks. Each task is divided into 2 steps. You are to press the speak button before reading the script. Once the task is successfully completed you are to click the confirm button.
I found it easier to complete the task using an activation phrase compared to no activation phrase
The absence of an activation phrase made the task feel slower or frustrating.
I felt more in control of the task when using an activation phrase.
The task is to find the weather of a city. First think of a city. Then, please repeat: I like apple pie with ice cream. It is a nice treat. Hey Buddy! Whats the weather in (city)
The task is to find the weather of a city. First think of a city. Then, please repeat: I like apple pie with ice cream. It is a nice treat. Whats the weather in (city)
The task is to set an alarm. First think of a time. Then, please repeat: I like cookies better than cake. It is a nice treat. Hey Buddy! Set an alarm for (time)
The task is to set an alarm. First think of a time. Then, please repeat: I like apple pie with ice cream. It is a nice treat. Set an alarm for (time)
The task is to calculate something. First think of an equation. Then, please repeat: The ocean is very calming. It is my favourite place. Hey Buddy! What is (equation)
The task is to calculate something. First think of an equation. Then, please repeat: The ocean is very calming. It is my favourite place. What is (equation)
